Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Energy-saving viewfinder, easy handling, plenty of preset shooting modes, hD video capabilities, good image quality
Cons: Poor image stabilization, low-resolution LCD, weak Blur Reduction mode
The 12.1-megapixel Canon PowerShot A1200 stands out among budget cameras with a rare find: an optical viewfinder. Reviewers also praise this pocket-friendly (4.8 ounces) camera for its easy handling and features. ...
Item.HelpfulCount: 3 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Ranked Fifth in Best Cheap Digital Camera
Item.Review: Not everybody looking to buy a new camera is interested in fiddling with settings or deciphering complex controls. Canon caters directly to this market with the extremely user-friendly PowerShot A1200, which strips out many manual controls in order to leave behind an easy-to-use compact camera which truly qualifies as a 'point-and-shoot'. The 12.1 ...

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Canon A1200 Not As Good as a1100
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
It has an Optical Finder which is great!
When the date / dater malfunctioned on my Canon A1100, I thought the A1200 would be a substantial replacement, it is not!
It looks cheaper; is made cheaper; has the shutter release in an odd place and more.
All I wanted was a camera that was as good as the A1100 and looked as good as the A1100. The only problem with the previous A1100 was the Power On button was too small.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Great color; Small / Compact; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; GREAT Macro Pictures; Takes AA batteries
We are a Canon family. Purchased this for my teenage daughter and she was instantly producing great quality photo's and video. I am amazed at the quality that can come out of this little camera! Love the small size, fits in a pocket. Purchased additional one for my husband, a gardening enthusiast, to capture plant photo's for his blog (he was borrowing my daughters all the time). Now he can keep it in his pocket and have it with him wherever he goes. I love that it takes AA batteries as they are available everywhere. Sorry to see so few camera's have this now, I consider it a huge plus, especially if you travel.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Easy To Use
Cons: Limited Zoom; No Viewfinder
Great little camera for the money! Surprising how good the image quality is in such an inexpensive little package! Video, although only a couple of minutes, isn't too bad either! Very impressive at a very low cost. If you want a "Grab and Go" camera, or a first camera as a gift, you can't go wrong. Battery life could be a bit better, but again, for the price it's a winner! Thanks Canon!!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Optical view finder; Date stamp
Cons: Short Battery Life; Auto focus almost useless; Poor Image Quality; Poor Image Stabilization; Lag / Shutter Delay
Bought this camera just before a trip to Australia because my Kodak was eating up batteries too quickly. This camera was a big disappointment. Display screen impossible to see in normal outside light. Optical view finder, while saving battery life, did not help making sure a photo was right before clicking the shutter. A high percentage of photos were out of focus. Very hard to depress shutter half way to wait for auto focus to work. Shutter very slow, 3 or 4 seconds to process photo. Instructions state that another picture can be taken while photo is developing, but doing that usually results in a ... n out of focus picture. No use at all to take quick candid photos. Those "Kodak Moments" will be lost. After a while, I switched to my Droid if a picture was really important to me even though the camera function of the Droid is difficult to use. This was my first (and last) Canon. I have been using digital cameras for over ten years and have taken over 100,000 shots. The only good consistant feature of this camera is the video recording. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Short Lag Time; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD
THIS CAMERA IS AMAZING. I'VE OWNED MANY INEXPENSIVE CAMERA, AND HAVE NEVER LIKED ANY OF THEM.
THIS TAKES AUTOMATIC GREAT PICTURES IN ALL SITUATIONS. AND THE PRICE IS GREAT.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact
Cons: Poor Image Quality
Nice camera, very good video. Pictures taken on Auto setting lack contrast and brightness and don't compare to an old Cannon A20 that shot at 2.1 mp. Now take all pictures on live setting with increased contrast. Not best at high white balance issues.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Had viewfinder
Cons: Poor Image Quality
Bought this camera because it was the only small digital with a viewfinder. The LCD screens are impossible to see in bright sun, so was thrilled to find this Canon. Took indoors and outdoors pics including different settings and macro. Took same pics with old Kodak (3.1 MP) and a Panasonic LumixDMC-FS4. The Panasonic blew the others out of the park! The Kodak produced MUCH better photos even enlarged! The Canon was NOT sharp, color was off especially in indoor shots, was very unhappy with results. Also the battery/SD access was awkward. [...]
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: This is just the camera that I have been waiting for. It has the viewfinder for bright days outdoors when the LCD display gets washed out. It has AA batteries, so I can get and use extra batteries when I am away from the recharger for long periods. It's Canon, which I like. And it is much smaller than I imagined, and so I can easily take it with me. Plus more features than I hoped for in an inexpensive camera. Just started to use it; So far so good. Images are a little fuzzy compared to other cameras, but excusable as it's a small, inexpensive lens.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: I bought this camera because it was the only one I could find with a viewfinder. Don't why that has gone out of fashion -- impossible to take a decent photo in the sunlight with only the back screen that goes black in bright light. However, was disappointed that it is powered by batteries rather than the more usual slim rechargeable battery. And, as I said above, the zoom function doesn't work well. Have to switch back and forth from 'live' to 'auto' every time it's used or it freezes. Fair price, takes decent photos. ...

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Nice Body Color; Large Clear LCD
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
I find the instructions rather complicated and so very user friendly.
The camera very quickly would get into a sleep mode while it is still on. I have to press any button to have it awake again. This is rather inconvenient when I have a precious to capture.
The camera is worth the cost for the qualities of the images and the videos I am getting.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: I use a camera daily in my residentiala real estate appraisal assignments. I take photos inside and out and hated the flat screen camera with no view finder that I have used in the past because there was always a reflection on the screen when I was outside and I could not see what I was taking a photo of half the time. This new camera has the flat screen on the back, but also a view finder I can peek into so there is no reflection. Also, because it uses standard AA batteries I didn't have to spend $40 on a second camera battery to have as a back-up. I use rechargeable standard batteries and I can buy AA batteries anywhere if necessary. The size of my new camera is a little bigger than my old Canon PowerShot1300 ELPH, but the new camera fits into my pocket just fine. Photo quality is g ... ood. Also, this has a good zoom. Some cameras have optical zoom and digital zoom and some have only one of these (sorry, I'm not a camera expert and can't remember which is which), but I like the zoom on this new one. Several other models in this price range had limited zoom. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Camera for the price. Awesome
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Great Zoom; Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Small / Compact
Excellent Camera. Much more than what I expected for the price. Nice Zoom. Its got everything I need. Not heavy at all.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: Pros: Easy to Use, Good Battery Life, Good in Low Light, Great Resolution, Large Clear LCD, Small / Compact ... Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay This is a great general use camera and, for the money, fabulous. Yes, it lacks some of the bells and whistles of more expensive cameras, but it has some very good feaures at that small price. One of my big reasons for buying this was its use of AA batteries instead of a re-chargeable proprietary battery. It also has a view finder, which is very difficult to find in an inexpensive camera and also allows you to download directly to a computer through a USB cable. It replaced a camera without a view finder and which used a proprietary battery. My wife had to guess at where she was shooting in bright light with the old camera, and I had to send the charger a ... nd spare battery with her. We do have another Canon and this has many of the features of the more expensive one. We love the A1200. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: Needed a compact camera to replace my aging Canon Powershot A85 which served the family well for about 6 years. Had four criteria: compact, optical viewfinder, wide-angle and AA batteries and did a search on [@]. I was glad to see Canon A1200 fit the bill. Very easy to use. Image quality is great for the price point. Connects to PC via mini-USB cable so nothing proprietary. This is a survival machine!
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: View finder; Clear images; High resolution; Buttons easier than A560; Can shut off display; Low Price; AA Batteries; Sd card
Cons: Buttons need learning
This replaced a Canon A560 [very similar] I broke recently. Batteries last a very long time when display is shut off and viewfinder used. Very clear images. Can use viewfinder in bright sunlight. Smaller than A560. AA batteries sold everywhere so don't need charger. Slight learning curve on buttons but manageable. Improved buttons from A560. Cheaper than A560. Clear images taken from public computer screen where no printout or flash download. I am glad Canon reissued an improved old standard!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: To my knowledge, it is the only compact with an optical view finder. I shake too much to snap a picture at arms length. Simple point and shoot settings and, as a bonus, it shoots HD videos. For the price, it cannot be beat. Highly recommended.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; Easy To Use; Good Image Quality
Cons: Not as good as A560 model; Lag / Shutter Delay; Very small optical viewfi; Difficult to hold; Full Manual on CD only; No image stablilzation; Hard to open battery case; Onoff switch location
I bought this to replace a 4yr old Canon A560 which is having problems with its zoom lens. After getting the A1200 home & doing a side by side comparison, the new model is slimmer & harder to use with just one hand. Opening the battery & SD memory card compartment on the bottom of the case is challenging & you're likely to hit the on/off button. Looking thru the optical viewfinder, what you see is much smaller than on the A560. It also takes a second or two longer be ... fore it's ready to take another pic. Is this because of the extra 5 mb pic size? I don't dislike the A1200, but I feel the A560 is more user friendly. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again and again
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Small / Compact; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use
I really like this camera. I bought it to take on my vacation but haven't gone yet.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: I like the eye level view finder.
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Great Zoom; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Short Lag Time; Good Image Quality; Good Image Stabilization; Terrific cameraI bought
This is a first class P & S digital camera even for an advanced photographer. Primarily, it is the eye level view finder that makes it more versatile. Many times,during outside photography it is very hard to compose on the LCD screen because of too much light. This is the only low cost point & shoot camera that I found with an eye level view finder. It serves my purpose very well.One has to buy a more expensive Cannon G12 or a Nikon P7100 or 7000 to get a compact digital rangefinder like camera to suit one's needs. N. Sablay, MD FACA (ret)

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Value for a Canon camera.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Good Image Stabilization; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Quality; Good in Low Light; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Nice Body Color; Small / Compact; Great Zoom
Great Canon camera. It is small and compact with good picture and video quality. I leave my Canon Rebel at home and slip this in my shirt pocket whenever I travel. Good value and it is a Canon!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Small / Compact
Cons: Short Battery Life; Poor Image Quality
This a small light weight camera. A good value for the money. Battery life is very short. Don't take it out without a box full of batteries.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Camera at a Great Price
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Small / Compact; Great Zoom; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Stabilization; Easy To Use
I ordered this camera because it is one of very few that has a viewfinder in addition to the LCD screen. It's great! I can now see what I'm taking a picture of even when the sun is shining and obliterating the screen. It's compact and very easy to use; it does all the work itself. I just have to turn it on, point and shoot. And the real bonus was that it was only [$] It would be nice if it came in different colors but the performance if this camera is everything I expected.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color
So far, so good. The camera is a tiny bit slower than my previous camera, but it has caught good photos based on what I see on the screen of the camera. I have not printed photos yet.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Optical ViewFinder; Great Value; Good Image Quality
It's getting more difficult to find point & shoot cameras with an optical viewfinder. This camera is easier to use in daylight conditions than my previous camera that cost twice as much. Don't have to worry about charging batteries with this one, either.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Minus a few flaws, very decent camera
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Easy To Use; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay; Short Battery Life
The main reason I got this camera was for taking pictures of wildlife. It does very well at this, as long as the wildlife isn't moving too much. It has a nice auto-focus feature, but it does not have a macro setting for up-close focus. The camera feels very sturdy, but is also a bit larger than some other point-and-shoot cameras, so if you are looking for something to carry in your pocket, this isn't it. The zoom is pretty decent, but once you get into the digital zoom, the images may not be as sharp (this is true of most small cameras). In short, it is very easy to use and a great camera for first time photographers.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: Bought this camera primarily for family (grandkids) photos. While it takes very good pictures and has a large, bright (except in sunlight) LCD screen, to me its most valuable feature is the optical viewfinder. If I have to put on my reading glasses (I'm 65) in order to clearly see an image on the screen, I won't use the camera. It's second most valuable feature to me is that it's much smaller and lighter than my Nikon D200 + 28-70mm zoom lens + flash.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Uses AA batteries; Great Pictures; Multiple settings avail; Lightweight and compact; Optical Viewfinder; Easy to use
Cons: A little slow on "rebound
Searched for months online for a compact camera w/ OPTICAL viewfinder. I wanted to be able to take pix without putting my glasses on. This is it! Bought it the moment it became available. Very lightweight & compact--which is important when I travel. AA batteries are always available. Auto and even an "easy" settings make this camera simple for everyone. Bright LED screen, too. When reviewing pix, can skip ahead 10, 100, or by date--love that. Face detection and lots of other features. Does seem to be a little slow on the rebound, but perhaps I am impatient. Thank you, Canon, for producing the camera I so ... ught! Thank you for recognizing that you have a contingent of potential customers with "older eyes" who want/need an optical viewfinder without moving up to a much more expensive camera. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Love having both a viewfinder and screen
Item.Review: It's so nice to be able to see what you are shooting in bright sunlight. Everyone I show it to loves the fact that it also has an optical viewfinder. The manufacturers should realize this and offer more models with both. The photos are fine, but I prefer the old A1000 which had the shutter and zoom control at the top right corner. The A1200 has the settings knob at the top right and you have to reach over that to the left for the shutter and zoom - a bit ackward. And of course the ability to use AA bateries comes in very handy.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Simple controls; Small / Compact; Optical ViewFinder; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color
Cons: Limited Zoom
Camera bought for outdoor & macro photos because of the optical viewfinder. Wish all manufacturers would include viewfinder on their smaller cameras. Nice extra features like the special effects selector mode (fish-eye etc). Just what I was looking for, just wish it had like an 8 or 10 times zoom. Great camera, great price, & great service from Adorama.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: AA batteries; Viewfinder; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Small / Compact; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use
Cons: Poor Image Stabilization; Lag / Shutter Delay
I had one that was my pocket camera that I usually took everywhere with me. I loaned it to my almost 9 year old granddaughter. She loves it so I bought this one for her birthday.
It's being replaced by an A1300, but it's still a good camera and it's less expensive than the A1300.
I bought the A1200 because it's the only P&S less than around $400 that has a viewfinder. The viewfinder is especially good for shooting in bright daylight when the LCD screen is hard to see.
It lacks stabilization which is another reason to use the viewfinder which is more stable than holding the camera out in front of ... you. But even if you use the LCD screen to compose the camera usually sets a high enough shutter speed when you use Auto ISO to prevent blur. Using the flash indoors also helps prevent blur. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Easy To Use
Cons: Short Battery Life; Lag / Shutter Delay; Poor Image Quality
I bought this for my daughter as a gift. She said it took good outdoor pics, but the quality of indoor pics wasn't that good. I my have got a defective one I'm not sure, but I returned it to the store.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to use with good results
Item.Review: Gets crisp landscape and interior shots. The viewfinder is a great feature, one becoming hard to find on new model cameras. It's small enought to fit in a shirt pocket, yet has some heft to it that I find desirable.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Definately would buy as a gift.
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Stabilization; Not to big nor to small; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color; Large Clear LCD; Fast/accurate auto-focus
I searched and searched for a camera that would give me a clear picture and one that I could take on trips. One that was not to big but not so thin it would fall out of my hands. Also wanted one that would be easy to use right out of the box. I like that the buttons are not to close to each other and an adult is able to use with comfort. This was actually a backup camera until I found it took better pictures then the $200 camera I purchased a week prior. Needless to say, I returned the $200 camera and am very happy with the size and quality of this camera.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice - but not quite what I needed
Item.Review: I was looking for a good digital camera with a viewfinder. This one had the viewfinder and good reviews, so I purchased it. It takes good pictures - when you find the right setting for the lighting conditions. But that is rather difficult. Night shots are the most trying. Battery life is good.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: I'm a professional photographer and people always ask me what camera they should buy. I always point them to B&H. I purchased two of the Canon Powershot A1200s for Xmas presents for friends this year. Having spoken to my friend and neighbor about the camera... she stated that the camera only gets about 20 - 30 shots per set of batteries. I found that hard to believe so offered her a new set of batteries from my own stash and it still only took about 30 pix on those batteries. Photo's are great. Ease of use great. The only point and shoot with a viewfinder... but battery use is unacceptable

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Easy To Use
Cons: Poor Image Quality
Bought it just to have something small to take quick pictures with. The only thing I don't like is the color is off. Took the same picture with another camera and this one and the color difference was amazing poor color from this camera

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Good Image Quality; Good Image Stabilization; Nice Body Color; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact
Cons: Limited Zoom; Lag / Shutter Delay
Overall, this camera is a good value. However, there are two factors that led me to return the camera for a refund... 1) The shutter button is located to the left of the mode button on top of the camera. This felt uncomfortable to me to reach across the mode button to press the shutter button. 2) The shutter lag time seemed much longer than my Canon A720IS.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color; View Finder for daylight
Cons: Difficult menus
Compact, Good Quality, Having a viewfinder is great! Price is real reasonable, menu could be easier to use. Picture quality and play-back is quite good

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Quality; Good in Low Light; Great Zoom; Good Image Stabilization; Nice Body Color; Small / Compact; Easy To Use
Not enough infor. in the booklet, I really need more infor. on different settings and what all the buttons are for. I would like it, in the booklet instead of the computer, so I have all the infor. with me.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: What can I say I have purchase 5 of them
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Great Zoom; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Easy hold on too; Good Image Stabilization; Good in Low Light; Nice Body Color; Short Lag Time
I am incharge of getting camera for work. I purchase one for my Vegas vaction. My husband feel in love with it there he purchase one while we were in Vegas for his golf pictures. He liked the video he said it helps with is golf swing. I came home and purchase 3 more for work. Everyone will pick up the Canon Powershot A1200 before they pick up any of the other camera I have in stock. They like it cause the front is not flat so they have a good hold on it when taken alot of pictures. We have to take at less 20 pictures per car and we have alease 20 cars a day.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: The only digital camera I've ever owned is a Canon PowerShot A530, but I wanted a lighter weight, slimmer camera with a larger LCD screen and found it in the Canon PowerShot A1200. I would never have a point-and-shoot that doesn't have a viewfinder as well and the A1200 has a large LCD screen and a viewfinder. I only just started shooting with it, but I'm enjoying playing with the fisheye option. Can't wait to read the manual and learn more! Best of all, this camera was affordable!!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: I use this for travels and everything else. I like the large screen and size. I had another Canon PowerShot before it and it's very similar. Easy to use and thank you, Canon, for using the same battery. Now I have a battery backup. Only thing I would have liked is if it had been a lighter weight, but it's not that important.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: I don't use it, my 6 year old daughter does. She wanted a real camera for quite a while now, and I was looking for something simple for her, with a few bells and whistles for later... this is perfect, great size, really nice quality images and the big plus is that it runs a a pair of AA's. No special charger or battery required, and that battery compartment gives the one side of the body a little bulge to make it easier to hold. And there's a tiny optical viewfinder too! How awesome is that. The rear LCD is a bit grainy, but not the images... This was a great buy at a great price.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Good Image Quality; Affordable
Cons: Bulky shape
We use this camera for our business; when we visit a job, we take photos of the project in order to have them at hand when preparing an estimate for the job.
It has a zoom that takes good enough closeups and is simple to learn how to use. The screen is a nice size for the size of the camera. I like that it came in a neutral color (we picked grey) as many of the others were in bright and shiny colors, which I did not prefer.
I wish it was a little less bulky -- one side of the camera bulges out -- my last camera was very flat and slipped into my pocket better.
I was not happy with the hardcopy booklet that came with the camera -- it does not list all of the functions and how to navigate ... to them -- it refers you to the CD for more detailed instructions -- which is not my preferred way of reference. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: This camera is very easy to use - and thank God for the view finder, it sure helps when it's sunny. The strap is another story - very difficult to thread through the holes provided - but that's a minor issue. This camera takes great pictures and will fit in your pocket. I'm "technology challenged" to say the least, and I figured it out in minutes. If you just want good vacation/family pictures - this is the camera for you. ...

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Good Image Stabilization; Small / Compact; Good Image Quality
Works well after one year. Optical viewfinder allows easy use in bright sunlight.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to carry; Short Lag Time; Good Image Quality; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Good Image Stabilization
Cons: Limited Zoom
Although I have a big, 35mm Canon camera with a great adjustable lens, sometimes it is awkward to carry such a big camera. This little camera fits in my pocket, so it is easily accessable. pictures are pretty good too.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Picture Perfect at a bargain price
Item.Review: I use the camera to document the general condition of building systems from roofs to basements and much in between. It's been reliable and has taken some drops and still functions. The battery cover doesn't take well to being dropped so it's best not to drop it at all.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: Just run of the mill pictures of my life. Nothing professional. I wanted one with a viewfinder after having a S50 for years. Nice easy to use little camera. I don't like the new version of Canon's Zoombrowser that came with it, however. The old one was simpler and much quicker. But the camera is great.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Great Zoom; Good Image Stabilization
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
I bought this camera to replace a nikon because that camera seemed to have a software incompatibility with iphoto. This canon not only takes very clear pictures, and is very compact, but also works well with iphoto editing software.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: Has a viewfinder as well as a rear LCD screen which makes taking a picture outside easier. Also uses regular AA batteries so it is easy to keep an extra pair of batteries available.Which is a good thing as it goes through thebargin batteries quickly if you use the flash continuously and the zoom feature frequently.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD
Cons: Limited Zoom; Poor Image Quality; Short Battery Life; Lag / Shutter Delay
Was looking for something small and convenient for work that didnt require a rechargable battery. Not a good choice. The AA batteries lasted about 25 pictures than I needed to change them.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Good Image Quality
I used the camera on a Ukraine vacation cruise & obtained good photos. One of the main reasons that I bought this camera was that it had a viewfinder which was very useful in bright light conditions.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Great Zoom; Good Image Quality; Small / Compact; Easy To Use
Supplements my digital SLR, which takes great photos, but is bulky. This one slips into a pocket, and takes better photos than your standard cellphone camera.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Good in Low Light; Easy To Use; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Nice Body Color; Fast/accurate auto-focus
Cons: Limited Zoom
Nice little camera for the price. Does everything I need. Like the fact it uses 2AA batteries and I can use my rechargable batteries. I have had good success using indoors with out a flash on none action photos.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to use for a Nana
Item.Review: With seven grandchildren close by, I am never without my camera. The ease of using the camera is seen with the setting dial and the placement of the zoom button make this a joy to use. I am very happy with all aspects of the camera.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: Shopped online and discovered the Powershot is one of the very few digital cameras where you can still look through a viewfinder to frame the shot. As soon as I read about that feature I ordered. I have seen others moving their camera this way and that, an awkward way to frame a shot. Not me, I'm going to get the shot I want by looking through the viewfinder of my A1200!!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: I bought this for my mom for mothers day and she's very happy with it. It works great and the images are nice. I haven't heard any complaints. I will say that the shutter release is in a funny spot, but nothing to stop you from buying.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: We got this as a gift for our soon-to-be 15 year old daughter, so we haven't fully used it yet, but I took it out of the box and played with it for awhile and it looks like we have a winner! She's going to love the fisheye and the toy camera settings. Hopefully the pictures come out beautifully!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: I am a retired professional photographer and was looking for a small pocket camera to use when i don't want to lug my Nikon D300 around. I can't stand it when all you have is that darned screen to compose your photos so I wanted something with an optical viewfinder and which uses plain old AA batteries. This one fit the bill. I am pleasantly surprised by the quality of the photos! This is a great little pocket camera.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Works very good
Cons: Cost
The product works very well [...] I feel the cost of the product should be less than $100 including delivery. I am very happy with the purchase. I would buy again.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: A1200BK - Canon A1200 Black Powershot 12 Megapixels Digital Camera review
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus,Good Image Quality,Large Clear LCD,Easy To Use,Small / Compact
I have a large Canon camera with lots of bells and whistles and wanted a small, compact point and shoot to carry around in my purse. Great camera and price. Really wanted a camera that used AA batteries and wanted a viewfinder. This new Canon model has both!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to use, a great value!
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom; Small / Compact
Cons: Short Battery Life
I bought this the day before leaving for vacation. It was easy to learn and I got some pretty great pictures.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Good in Low Light; Good Image Stabilization; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom; Nice Body Color; Good Image Quality; Small / Compact
I love the fact that it has a view finder that you can look through. Most digitals do not and in sun light you cannot see the image on the back so you don't know if the picture is what you want.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Stabilization; Nice Body Color; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD
Bought this to donate to the local animal shelter. They love it! Takes great pictures.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: This camera has one very good thing going for it and that is the two viewfinders - either the eyepiece that actually works outdoors in sunlight and the full screen that is no good in sunlight. That it uses batteries that are not rechargeable is not so good, but acceptable. Newer cameras of the "pocket" style do not have eyepiece viewfinders that work in sunlight so they require a person using them to guess at the picture being taken. It is OK as a camera with its strongpoint being the eyepiece viewfinder. ...

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; Good in Low Light; Good Image Quality; Good Image Stabilization
Cons: Short Battery Life
I own a Canon SX130IS and like it. This is the same camera, but with a little less zoom. I bought 2 for my daughters for Christmas. They love them. Great pictures and not a lot of stuff they don't need.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Optical ViewFinder; Easy To Use; AA batteries; Fast/accurate auto-focus
This camera has optical viewfinder- great to use when taking pictures in bright sunlight. Also has AA batteries- easy to find when traveling.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: Bought this camear for my Mother-in-Law. We wanted something simple to use but yet has good picture quality. She found the camera very easy to use and understand. Instruction were simple to follow. Pictures were very satisfying.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Good in Low Light; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
I use this almost daily for close-ups of jewelry and other small items I sell online and it's more than adequate for that. Also recently took some great outdoor wedding photos with it. The biggest downside I've found is that the shutter release button is closer to the middle instead of on the end like older models and harder to reach if holding the camera with one hand.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Fast/accurate auto-focus; User friendly; Perfect for trips; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Small / Compact
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
Thank you for the view finder!!!! Thank you for the light weight!!!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great camera for the casual user
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Stabilization; Easy To Use
Why don't more cameras have view finders in addition to the LCD screen for better viewing shots in bright light??? This is one of the best features of this camera.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: This Canon camera is not a high-end digital, but for a low-cost, intermediate product, it is tremendous value for the dollar. The best part is that it is light, easily carried, and VERY easy to use, giving excellent quality photos as long as you do not expect all of the bells and whistles that an expensive, high-end digital camera may have. Having said that, the bells and whistles that it DOES have are far more than one might expect for a camera of this price.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera
Item.Review: I am very disappointed in the quality of this camera. It is truly a piece of junk. It was a birthday gift for my 14 year old who wanted a camera of her own. I did not want to buy the cheapest one, but did not want a real expensive one either. I'm sure I would have been better off buying something else. I bought a less expensive digital camera about 5 years ago that still takes better pics and was much higer quality. VERY DISAPPOINTING. ...
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Has a lot in a small package
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Has a viewfinder; Short Lag Time; Easy To Use; Easy to silence; Good in Low Light; Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Stabilization; 4x zoom is easy to use
Cons: Only 4X Zoom
For those of us with old eyes and transitional lenses, it is great to have a viewfinder. but the screen is more visible in bright light than on my last canon. i gave up more zoom to get the viewfinder.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: 720p video; Optical viewfinder -rare; 1000charge; Easy To Use; AA batt; Good Image Quality; Small / Compact; 100; battery life; Unexpensive
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay; Too many Mpix
Optical VF is almost gone from any P&S today; this was amongst the last compact to feature one - i bought it. And HD 720p H.264 video is not bad either for [$]. IQ is OK, typical Canon P&S output; great for consumers. I wished the tiny sensor would have only 5-7Mpix, instead of 12+, but marketing is driving this segment.Finally, an excellent battery life.Over 1000 pics per charge, using 2x AA batts.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; HD Movie; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Short Lag Time
An awesome little camera for the price. As a fire investigator, I keep it in my turnout gear, and it's performed extremely well under adverse conditions. I liked it so much that I donated one to my FD to keep on on first response Engine.
Interestingly it's taken the place of my Sony A330 35mm digital for most routine work. The Canon is a good value, excellent performace.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: at last a view finder on a digital
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Short Lag Time; Easy To Use; Good Image Quality; View finder is great; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Small / Compact
I have been looking for a digital camera with a viewfinder. It is almost impossible to see the screen in full sunlight, and I was thrilled to find this camera with the view finder.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Nice Body Color; Good Image Stabilization; Short Lag Time; Small / Compact; Good in Low Light; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; Easy To Use; Great Zoom; Easy to understand
Cons: Short Battery Life
Pictures were clear even with rain. Enjoyed the viewfinder and zoom lens worked great.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Has a real view finder; Good Image Stabilization
I just wanted an easy to use digital camera that was small and had a view finder.
Haven't used it long enough to be more critical or praiseworthy.
Doesn't come with a case, but I had one.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Stabilization; Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD; Short Lag Time; Small / Compact; Nice Body Color; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Quality; Good in Low Light
Cons: Limited Zoom
Was a wonderful upgrade from my old cannon.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Had what I wanted - a viewfinder
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color; Great Zoom; Good in Low Light; Small / Compact
So far, so good

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Nice Body Color; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Good in Low Light; Short Lag Time; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality; Great Zoom
Great camera...glad I made the investment

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Nice Body Color; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Stabilization; Small / Compact; Good in Low Light; Short Lag Time
It's what I wss looking for

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Affordable dependable and easy to use
Item.Review:
Pros: Short Lag Time; Great Zoom; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Nice Body Color; Small / Compact; Good in Low Light; Good Image Stabilization
I bought this for use in our pre-school and it is easy for all staff to use except closing the battery compartment

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Easy To Use; Small / Compact
Cons: Poor Image Stabilization; Poor Image Quality
I USE THIS CAMERA UNDER CONDITIONS THAT I DO NOT WANT TO USE MY "REAL" CAMERA.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Stabilization; Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Good Image Quality; View Finder; Great Zoom; Fast/accurate auto-focus
Cons: Short Battery Life
Glad I found this camera

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Stabilization; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Good Image Quality
It still has an optical view finder which, to those of use who do not like to use LCD view screens, made the purchase a no brainer.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Short Lag Time; Large Clear LCD; Nice Body Color; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Great Zoom; Fast/accurate auto-focus

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: View finder on small camera is a plus!!!
Item.Review:
Pros: View Finder; Good Image Stabilization; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact
Love my new small camera.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: This is my 2nd camera of this model
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and light-weight; Viewfinder; Easy to Use; Good quality pictures
I already had one of these cameras and bought a second one for my husband to use on vacation next month because I didn't want to share.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Reviewer: RT STONE the Artist and Designer
Item.Review:

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review: well am happy with my order even thoe you guys had to ship it again couse the first one i didnt get and it took over 3 weeks almost a month.but i would off imagine this product alittle bit better.anyways thank you.....

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Good Image Stabilization; Short Lag Time; Great Zoom; 10 yr old took pics; Small / Compact; Viewfinder; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use
Wow, my 10 year old granddaughter took wonderful pictures on our trip to Italy - sometimes better than ours with more complicated cameras!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; Great Zoom; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Stabilization
We have used this product and are very happy with it and with the accessories. We use it for work.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Viewfinder
seems to be a great little camera. I got it for an overseas trip, did not break my bank, so if I lose it I will be OK. I wanted the optical viewfinder and this is one of the very few cameras that still have them. Still trying it out before I go!

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Simple to use, high resolution camera
Item.Review:
Pros: Viewfinder; Good in Low Light; Short Lag Time; Small / Compact; Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; AA batteries; Easy To Use
Cons: Limited Zoom
This is a small, versatile camera for use in out-door activities where the intent is to obtain documentation rather than artistic results, plus the price is right.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would recommend this camera for anyone
Item.Review: I would not buy another camera that did not have a view finder. the A1200 is great and easy to use. I have no trouble outdoors with the view finder it is easy to see the subject. Great camera

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Short Lag Time; Good Image Quality; Nice Body Color; Easy To Use
This camera is definitely worth much more than its price. I bought it only as a test to compare it with my other pointer-and-shooters and my Canon T2i. While it beats all of my pointer-and-shooters in the same price range, it cannot compete with my SLR Canon T2i in sharpness and low-light grains. This Canon A1200 has two stunningly beautiful features that attract me---optical viewfinder that saves a lot of battery power and the AA batteries which are easily available everywhere in the world.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Stabilization; Short Lag Time; Small / Compact; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom; Good in Low Light; Good Image Quality
this is the best camera i have ever owned

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Optical ViewFinder; Nice Body Color; Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact
This camera has an optical viewfinder which is hard to find in a small camera, but is a necessity for me.

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)

Item.Item: Canon PowerShot A1200 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
